Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[4]: "Is there something you would like to know?"
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[6]: "Tell me which god do you serve?"
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[8]: "Where there is creation, there must be destruction. Such
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[9]: "Common folk often portray Gro-goroth as a being of evil
or an entity that must be avoided by all costs."
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[11: "Sylvian, the goddess... She once loved us so..."
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[13: "That is when lust, sex and addiction take a form of
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[14: "Alll-Mer is the most recent of all the older gods."
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[15: "But that is only because he made himself apparent at such
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[16: "He has existed for aeons as a seed of his father."
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[17: "Yes, there are countless older gods less known in these
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[18: "God of the Depths has an especially strong influence in
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[19: "The older gods have left this earth for us to suffer.
There are but traces of them left anymore."
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[20: "That is why many are turning their hopes for the new
gods. But many fail to see their path to ruin."
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[22: "The new gods offer new values. Values of greed, lust for
power, inhibition of sex and desperate seek for new
Map105.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[23: "Hm. So it is so - there is not room for all of us,

Map105.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map105.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map105.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[4]: "I am a wretched worshipper of Alll-Mer, the ascended one,
the christ, the one who died for our sins."
Map105.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[5]: "On the empty scrolls I wrote the name of our savior -
Map105.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[6]: "As the next verse I would plead him - GIVE..."
Map105.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[7]: "As the final, third verse, I would ask for CHEESE,
LANTERN, SHORT SWORD or even a book about our christ."

Map105.Event[111].Page[0].list.message[0: The head of the Valteil the Enlightened one falls down to
the darkness where it once rose.
Map105.Event[111].Page[0].list.message[1: Millenia of wisdom and knowledge that is too much for
a normal person to bear passes though your head.
Map105.Event[111].Page[0].list.message[2: You only get glimpses of what is waiting for you on the
other side, but this information stream is too much for
Map105.Event[111].Page[0].list.message[4: But that doesn't matter as you can clearly feel how
something greater has just started to change...
Map105.Event[111].Page[0].list.message[5: The cogs of Fear & Hunger have just begun to rotate on a
Map105.Event[111].Page[1].list.message[0: There is an abyss down there...
Map105.Event[112].Page[0].list.message[0: As you take a look down into the darkness, it almost looks
like you see a giant shape floating towards you...
Map105.Event[113].Page[0].list.message[0: Whatever awaits you down all these ladders feels enormous...
Map105.Event[114].Page[0].list.message[1: "Valteil the enlightened one is looming there in the
Map105.Event[114].Page[0].list.message[2: "He is a miserable worm. Let's destroy him."
Map105.Event[114].Page[0].list.message[3: "You hear that, Valteil?! YOU ARE A MISERABLE WORM!"
